next_steps.note: "Define the scope of 'localhost' scanning: Specifically, what ports/services will be targeted (e.g., common web ports, database ports, SSH). Document this scope.",
"Select a port scanning tool: Choose a tool for scanning (e.g., nmap, netcat, masscan) and install/configure it on your local machine.",
"Develop a basic scan script: Write a script (even a simple command line one) to perform a TCP connect scan on the defined ports of localhost.",
"Document the initial scan results: Record the output of the initial scan script, noting open/closed ports and any identified services.  Start a 'results' document.",
"Identify potential vulnerabilities based on open ports: Research the services running on identified open ports and document potential vulnerabilities to investigate in later phases."
